name: Trello-weekly-report
body:
## Trello Weekly Report generator
### Introduction
A very simple command-line tool that parses a Trello board in JSON format, that I use to create progress reports.

This is just a toy project to gain some more experience with Git and Python.

### How to use it
Download the sources. Then execute `python create-report.py -f sample.json`

Here's a more visual explanation: ![Screenshot that shows how simple this is](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1581166/trello-report-creator.png)
tagline: Create a progress report out of a Trello JSON dump
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
